name: 3D Angry Zombies Attack
description:
3D Angry Zombies Attack is an attacking game. You have been hired as a contract killer to finish the deadly zombies and clear the old buildings.
Features:
- Console High quality & Realistic 3D graphics.
- Fast paced, intense gameplay.
- FREE download – Easy of use and completely free-to-play
- Challenging Levels & Realistic Mechanism
